title: Scrambled Eggs with Onion
steps: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour eggs over onion and stir gently.
Cook until eggs are set but still moist.

title: Classic Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in a non-stick pan.
Pour in eggs and let set slightly.

title: French Toast
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and sugar.
Cook bread until golden on both sides.

title: Fried Rice
steps: Beat eggs and scramble in oil.
Sauté onion, garlic, peas, and carrot.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
steps: Heat olive oil and sauté garlic until golden.

title: Tomato Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook down.
Season with salt, pepper, and basil.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Grill in pan until golden on both sides.

title: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: Make dressing with garlic and lemon.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
steps: Add shrimp and cook 2-3 minutes per side.

title: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Cook onion and garlic in butter.
Add wine and stir until absorbed.

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Add broth and bring to boil.

title: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

title: Caprese Salad
steps: Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic.

title: Pasta Carbonara
steps: Remove from heat, add egg mixture.

title: Teriyaki Chicken
steps: Mix soy sauce, honey, garlic, and ginger.

title: Hummus
steps: Blend with tahini, garlic, and lemon.

title: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Mix in eggs and green onion.

title: Guacamole
steps: Fold in diced onion and tomato.

title: Baked Salmon
steps: Top with garlic, lemon, and dill.

title: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Dredge in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.

title: Macaroni and Cheese
steps: Make roux with butter and flour.

title: Bruschetta
steps: Mix with basil, garlic, and oil.

title: Fish Tacos
steps: Top with sour cream and cilantro.

title: Deviled Eggs
steps: Cut in half and remove yolks.
Mash yolks with mayo and mustard.

title: Sloppy Joes
steps: Brown beef with onion and pepper.
Add tomato sauce, sugar, and mustard.

title: Beef Burrito
steps: Layer rice, beans, beef, and cheese.

title: Lemon Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in lemon and garlic.

title: Club Sandwich
steps: Stack with third slice of bread.

title: Egg Drop Soup
steps: Top with green onion and sesame oil.

title: Shakshuka
steps: Cover and cook until eggs set.

title: Honey Garlic Chicken
steps: Mix honey, garlic, soy sauce, ginger.

title: Eggs Benedict
steps: Make hollandaise with yolks and butter.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Make sauce with onion, garlic, ginger.

title: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Make sauce with butter and cream.

title: Croque Monsieur
steps: Layer ham and cheese on bread.
Top with more cheese and sauce.

title: Chicken Wings
steps: Make buffalo sauce with butter and hot sauce.

title: Dal Tadka
steps: Make tadka with ghee and spices.

title: Fish and Chips
steps: Make batter with flour and beer.

title: Kung Pao Chicken
steps: Make sauce with soy sauce and vinegar.

title: Cheese Quesadilla
steps: Cook until golden on both sides.

title: Hot and Sour Soup
steps: Season with vinegar and soy sauce.

title: Stuffed Zucchini
steps: Halve zucchini and scoop out seeds.

title: Peanut Butter Sandwich
steps: Spread peanut butter on one slice.

title: Orange Chicken
steps: Make sauce with orange and soy.

title: Ahi Tuna Poke
steps: Mix with soy sauce and sesame oil.

title: Chicken Biryani
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.

title: Chicken Satay
steps: Marinate chicken in coconut and curry.

title: General Tso's Chicken
steps: Cut and coat chicken in cornstarch.

title: Cheesecake
steps: Add eggs one at a time.

title: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
steps: Mix meat with rice and onion.

title: Pierogi
steps: Make dough with flour and egg.

title: Green Curry
steps: Fry curry paste in coconut cream.
Season with fish sauce and sugar.

title: Cacio e Pepe
steps: Toss pasta with cheese and water.

title: Tom Yum Soup
steps: Season with fish sauce and lime.
